page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: {A DAY IN MY LIFE}by Robert Hinchliffe I woke up this morning at 7.30am and got up shortly afterwards and went dowmstairs to get breakfast. I had cerial, toast, and orange juice. Then I got ready for school, packed my lunch and books in my bag. I called for my friend Christopher. We arrived at school just before 9am when school starts. The morning work included English< maths and a reading session. The reading session is my favourite because I like books so much. Then we have a school assembly where we all join together and sing Hymns. We had a break for milk and play, followed by Art/Craft till lunch time. I had a jam sandwich and a friut drink, then we went outside to play. We have a long break at lunch time, I played games like hide and seek with my brother and my friend Gregory. (cont)
